O

OfferController - Class in com.turnout.ws.controller
OfferController class is front face for accessing and manipulating offers(promos and upsells) related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds.
OfferController(OffersService, StudioService) - Constructor for class com.turnout.ws.controller.OfferController
An injectable constructor with dependencies of ofrService,studioService as argument.
offerDetails(int) - Method in class com.turnout.ws.controller.OfferController
This method will get offer details from database based on offer id.
offerDetails(int) - Method in interface com.turnout.ws.service.OffersService
used to get offer details based on the offer id pass.
offerDetails(int) - Method in class com.turnout.ws.service.OffersServiceImpl
This method will get offer details from database based on offer id.
Offers - Class in com.turnout.ws.domain
The persistent class for the OFFERS database table.
Offers() - Constructor for class com.turnout.ws.domain.Offers
 
offerSearch(String) - Method in class com.turnout.ws.controller.OfferController
This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name.
offerSearch(String) - Method in class com.turnout.ws.repository.CustomOffersRepository
Returns list of offers after offers searching is done.
offerSearch(String) - Method in interface com.turnout.ws.service.OffersService
This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name passed string.
offerSearch(String) - Method in class com.turnout.ws.service.OffersServiceImpl
This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name passed string.
OffersRepository - Interface in com.turnout.ws.repository
JPA specific extension of Repository for OffersRepository.So it can encapsulating storage, retrieval, and search behavior which emulates a collection of objects.
OffersService - Interface in com.turnout.ws.service
 
OffersServiceImpl - Class in com.turnout.ws.service
 
OffersServiceImpl(OffersRepository, BeaconMasterRepository, StudioRepository, CustomOffersRepository) - Constructor for class com.turnout.ws.service.OffersServiceImpl
An injectable constructor with a dependencies as argument.
OffersServiceImplTest - Class in com.turnout.ws.service
This is a testing class for OffersServiceImpl.So here, we mock that class to write test cases and validate generated output are same as expected for given input.
OffersServiceImplTest() - Constructor for class com.turnout.ws.service.OffersServiceImplTest
